title: Recipes
text:
Preface
These are the recipes I like to use.

title: 1  Bread
text: 1.1 Basic Bread

title: 1  Bread
text:
500g bread flour
1/2tsp salt
1tsp yeast
1tsp sugar
1tbsp oil
325ml warm water





220C
35 mins
loaf

title: 1  Bread
text:
1.2 Focaccia




500g bread flour
7g yeast
5/2 tbsp olive oil
salt
rosemary
350-400ml water





200C
25 mins
25x35”


Method


- Knead 5-10mins.
- Prove 1hr.
- Stretch to fit tin.
- Prove 45m.
- Dimple, add rosemary, drizzle with oil, 1tbsp water, salt.
- Bake.
- Drizzle with oil while hot.

title: 1  Bread
text:
1.3 Pizza Dough




1/2 tsp yeast
150ml warm water
1/4 tsp sugar
220g P flour
3/2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
1/3 tsp salt
semolina








Method


- Bloom yeast, water and sugar for 10mins -> bubble.
- Combine until shaggy dough.
- Knead 10-15min.
- Prove.
- Semolina under dough on baking tray.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.1 Chocolate Biscuits
Method
- Cream until light and fluffy.
- Beat in eggs.
- Fold rest.
- Roll, chill, bake.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
125g butter
175g light brown sugar
1 egg
175g SR flour
50g cocoa
100g chocolate chips





170C
12-15 mins
25

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.2 Chocolate Chip Cookies




125g (4.5 oz) marg
100g (3.5oz) light brown sugar
2tbsp syrup
vanilla
16og (5.5oz) SR flour
150g chocolate chips





180C
12 mins
16


Method


- Combine, roll bake.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.3 Chocolate Crackle Tops




7oz plain chocolate
3.5oz butter
4oz caster sugar
3 eggs
vanilla
7.5oz P flour
1oz cocoa
1/2tsp BP
pinch salt





160C
10-15 mins
22


Method


- Melt chocolate and butter.
- Mix, chill for 1 hr, roll in icing sugar, bake.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.4 Chocolate Fork Biscuits




150g P flour
1tsp BP
70g caster sugar
125g marg
1tsp vanilla
20g cocoa
pinch salt





180C
15 mins


Method


- Cream sugar, marg, vanilla.
- Roll, fork, bake.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.5 Coconut Oat Cookies




100g brown sugar
115g margarine
3tbsp syrup
1tsp vanilla
145g oats
125g P flour
180g coconut
1tsp B of S
1/2 tsp cinnamon
1tbsp- milk





180C
15-18 mins
22


Method


- Melt sugar, marg, syrup.
- Roll, bake.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.6 Double Chocolate Cookies




110g margarine
100g caster sugar
100g light brown sugar
1tsp vanilla
125g P flour
55g cocoa
1tsp BP
pinch salt
1tbsp milk
100g chocolate chips





180C
10 mins
16


Method


- Roll, bake, top with chips.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.7 Gingerbread




125g (4.5oz) marg
100g(3.5oz) dark brown sugar
4tbsp syrup
325g (11.5oz) P flour
1tsp B of S
2tsp ginger
1tsp cinnamon





170C
9-10m mins
17 x trees


Method


- Melt marg, sugar, syrup.
- Stir to a stiff dough.
- Roll, cut, chill, bake.


Notes


- Can bake dough from frozen, add couple more minutes.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.8 Lebkuchen




7oz runny honey
3oz butter
7oz P flour
3.5oz ground almonds
1tsp BP
1/4tsp B of S
3/2 tsp cinnamon
3.5tsp ginger
1tsp mixed spice
(1/2tsp nutmeg/allspice/..)
1/2 zest and juice of orange
200g chocolate





180C
15 mins
18


Method


- Melt honey and butter, then cool 5 mins in fridge.
- Add remaining then chill for at least an hour.
- Roll with damp hands.
- Bake, cool, dip.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.9 Lemon Sandwich Biscuits




150g butter
1 lemon zest
85g caster sugar
1 egg yolk
280g P flour
1tbsp cornflour

Filling:
75g butter
130g icing sugar
2tbsp lemon curd





180C
14-16 mins
20 x sandwiches


Method


- Cream sugar, butter, zest 2-3 mins until pale and creamy.
- Beat in egg yolk 1 min.
- Mix in flour -> clumps.
- Bring to ball, roll to 3-4mm thick, chill at least an hour.
- Cut, bake.
- Beat buttercream 3-5mins until very pale and creamy before adding lemon curd.


Notes


- Can top with simple lemon icing.

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.10 Oaty Chocolate Chip Cookies




4oz marg
4oz light brown sugar
1 egg
1tsp vanilla
5oz SR flour
3oz oats
8oz choc chips





190C
15-20 mins
19

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.11 Shortbread

8oz (icing sugar + cornflour)
8oz plain flour
demerara sugar





170C
15 mins
37 x 5.5cm

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.12 Triple Chocolate Cookies




200g butter
300g light brown sugar
vanilla
2 eggs
80g cocoa

1tsp BP

14 mins
28

title: 2  Biscuits
text:
2.13 Viennese Biscuits




250g butter
50g icing sugar
225g P flour
25g cornflour
Buttercream 100g butter
200g icing sugar





170C
10-15 mins
30 x sandwiches


Method


- Lots beating to pale and fluffy.
- Then sieve flours and beat until well mixed.
- Pipe and bake.


Notes


- To make jam:
- 160g raspberry
- 200g jam sugar
- Dark chocolate to dip.

title: 3  Cakes
text: 3.1 Banana Loaf

title: 3  Cakes
text:

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.2 Carrot Cake




6oz marg
6oz light brown sugar
3 eggs
4oz carrot
2oz raisins
2oz dates
1/2tsp cinnamon
1/4tsp nutmeg
1oz coconut
1oz walnuts
6oz wholemeal flour
pinch salt
1tsp BP





180C
90 mins
8” round


Notes


- For vegan option:
- Replace eggs with 7.5oz apple puree and 3/2tsp BP.
- May need to cook a little longer with foil on top.

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.3 Chocolate And Sweet Potato Loaf




250 boiled sweet potato
100g plain chocolate
125 marg
150g light brown sugar
2 eggs
175g SR flour
1/2 tsp BP
75g chocolate chips

Topping:
100g plain chocolate
25g marg
2tbsp syrup
25g chocolate chips





160C
50-60 mins
loaf


Method


- Mash potato and chocolate together.

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.4 Chocolate Cake




400g caster sugar
100g cocoa
300g P flour
2tsp B of S
1tsp salt
500ml boiling water
125ml oil
1tbsp apple cider vinegar





180C
20-25 mins
2 x 8” round


Method


- Mix dry together.
- Quickly add wet.

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.5 Devil’s Food Cake




2oz cocoa
6floz boiling water
6oz marg
12oz dark brown sugar
3 eggs
10oz P flour
3/2tsp B of S
1/4 tsp BP
4floz soured cream/buttermilk





180C
30-35 mins
9” round


Method


- Mix and cool cocoa and water.
- Cream marg, sugar and eggs.
- Sift dry twice.
- Add dry to creamed in 3 batches, alternating with dairy.

title: 3  Cakes
text:

8oz SR flour
1/2tsp B of S
2tsp ginger
1/2tsp cinnamon
1/4 pt milk
4oz marg
4tbsp treacle
4os dark brown sugar
2 eggs





180C
45 mins
8” round


Method


- Melt milk, marg, treacle, sugar.

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.7 Ginger Cake




350g P flour
225g dark brown sugar
2-3tsp ginger
1tsp BP
t/1tsp B of S
pinch salt

title: 3  Cakes

5oz caster

loaf


Notes

- Lemon Drizzle:
- zest 2 lemons, 4tbsp (juice and caster sugar).

1tsp BP

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.10 Raspberry And Almond Cake




4oz SR flour
2oz ground almonds
5oz caster sugar
2eggs
4floz (5oz) yoghurt
4floz oil
1tsp vanilla/almond

flaked almonds, for topping





170C
50-60 mins
8” round


Method

title: 3  Cakes
text:
3.11 Victoria Cake




8oz mix
1tsp BP





180C
25-30 mins
2 x 8” round


Notes


- Or makes 20 fairy cakes or 16 cupcakes.

title: 4  Desserts
text: 4.1 Crumble Topping

title: 4  Desserts
text:
4oz P flour
4oz marg
2oz oats
3oz sugar
2oz coconut

title: 4  Desserts
text:
4.2 Easy Chocolate Pudding




50g P flour
1/2tsp BP
1tbs cocoa
50g caster sugar
50g melted butter
1 egg
vanilla
1- tbs milk
25g nuts

Topping:
50g brown sugar
1tbs cocoa
60ml hot water





180C
30 mins
1/2 litre dish


Method


- Pour topping on top before baking (becomes a sauce underneath sponge).


Notes


- Serves 3.

title: 4  Desserts
text:
4.3 Steamed Syrup Cake




1tbsp breadcrumbs
3tbsp syrup
6oz mix





90 mins
1 litre bowl


Method


- Put breadcrumbs and syrup at bottom of dish.


Notes


- Optional:
- lemon zest.

title: 4  Desserts
text:
4.4 Sticky Toffee Pudding




120ml water
200g dates
110g butter
110g light brown sugar
200g SR flour
1tsp B of S
1tbsp ginger
2tsp mixed spice
1tsp cinnamon
240ml milk
1tbsp apple cider vinegar
Sauce:
3tbsp syrup
200g light brown sugar
150g butter
1tsp vanilla





170C
50 mins
1 litre dish


Method


- Simmer dates in water for 5mins.
- Cream butter and sugar.
- Add vinegar very very last.
- Melt sauce ingredients and simmer 5m.
- Prick, pour over 1/2 sauce. Rest to serve.

title: 4  Desserts
text:
4.5 Yule Log




4 eggs;100g caster sugar
65g SR flour
40g cocoa. 
Filling:
200g/ml ganache
cream
berries





200C
8-10 mins
13x9”

title: 5  Extras
text:
5.1 Buttercream
Notes
- Can replace 1/2 oz icing sugar with cocoa.

title: 5  Extras
text:
4oz butter
4oz icing sugar

title: 5  Extras
text:
5.2 Chocolate Ganache




100g plain/white chocolate
100ml double cream








Method


- Heat cream, pour over, site, whisk 10 mins.

30 mins
swiss roll

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.2 Brownies

3oz plain chocolate

2 eggs

1oz cocoa
pinch salt
4oz chocolate chips





170C
30 mins
8” square


Method

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.3 Cafe Granola




200g marg
200g light brown sugar
75g syrup
350g oats
50g seeds
200g fruit/nuts
80g P flour





180C
20-25 mins
8” square


Method


- Melt marg, sugar, syrup.


Notes


- From when managing B&B.

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.4 Chocolate Caramel Shortbread




Base:
10oz P flour
5oz caster sugar
pinch salt
10oz butter

Filling:
4oz marg
1 tin condensed milk

4tbsp syrup





180C
25 mins
11” square


Method


- Bring to boil then boil gently 7 mins.

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.5 Coffee Fudge Squares




6oz marg
6ox caster sugar
8oz SR flour
1.5tsp BP
3 eggs
2tbsp milk
1tbsp coffee

Topping:
2oz butter
4oz light brown sugar
2tbsp milk
up to 10oz icing sugar
walnuts





180C
30 mins
rectangle


Method


- Melt butter, sugar, milk gently until dissolves.
- Boil briskly 3 mins.
- Stir in icing sugar, beat and spread quickly.

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.6 Flapjacks




3oz marg
4oz light brown sugar
3tbs syrup
2oz raisins
2oz walnuts
6oz oats





180C
20-25 mins


Notes


- Can replace 2oz sugar with 2oz coconut, may need extra squirt of syrup.

title: 9  Traybakes
text:
9.7 Lemon Bars




Base:
6oz P flour
4oz marg
2oz caster sugar

Filling:
200g caster sugar
25g P flour
pinch salt
3 eggs
3 lemon zest
200ml lemon juice (3-4 lemons)





160-180C
25-35 mins
8” square


Method


- Bake shortbread at 180 for 15-20mins.
- Whisk filling together while base is cooling, pour over and bake at 160 for 10-15 mins (until top is just set).
- Dust with icing sugar.

text:

pinch salt

1box raspberries

8” square

Topping:
7oz milk chocolate
6oz macademia nuts





180C
20-25 mins
9” round
